page.name: main
page.script:
var prepareMusicService = "开通音乐服务" var onlinePrepareMusicService = "即将支持在线开通，敬请期待！" var prepareMusicServiceTip = "连接ORVIBO蓝牙音箱，即可免费获得1年试用权"
func exit_onClick_handle(){ set_property("play","up_image","res/icon_play_normal2.png") set_property("play","down_image","res/icon_play_press2.png") send_event("exit",aa) }
